title: Mouse cursor moves fast when pinging
body: I've noticed that when I try to ping by holding down my G key , and dragging my mouse to (for example) Enemy Missing, my mouse flies across the screen as if my DPI just shot up randomly. If anyone else has had this issue and fixed it please help me out ! Thanks everyone

replies.body: I have this problem too. I'm running Better Touch Tool. I wonder if that's the problem?

That miiiiight have something to do with a kind of overlay software running in the background like Discord's Overlay. It's been known to cause a few issues here and there with League lately, so try turning that off if you have it active and let me know if that helps.

I actually usually don't run much in the background. For example, I've been playing this morning with only Sticky notes & Google Chrome open as far as applications. Mcafee & Razer Synapse are in the background as well but not open.
No worries with those, but still, try turning them all off to see if that helps with your mouse. Most likely I'm guessing Synapse might be interfering if anything.
Gonna bump this real quick so you see it again :D
